com.meteorcode.pathway.samples.sparks

Class AsciiViewEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meteorcode.pathway.model.Event
      • com.meteorcode.pathway.samples.sparks.AsciiViewEvent

  • public class AsciiViewEvent
extends Event
    AsciiViewEvent is an Event which updates an AsciiBallView when the event is evaluated.

    • Method Detail

      • evalEvent

        public void evalEvent()
               throws ScriptException
        Description copied from class: Event

        The method that is called to actually perform the thing done by an Event. Should be called as part of the event loop, when an event is finally... you know, evented.

        NOTE that this occurs after the event has been propagated, and also NOTE that this method will *not* be called on an invalidated Event. (Event code shouldn't have to worry whether or not they're invalid)

        Specified by:
        evalEvent in class Event
        Throws:
        ScriptException
